sensors

Interface UltrasonicListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Avoidance, BlockAvoidanceLab5, CollisionListener, Lab5Part1, LocalizeLab5

    public interface UltrasonicListener
    these are the interface for classes that listens to the ultrasonic poller it contains a method ultrasonicDistance(int distance); which obtains the distance measured by the ultrasonic poller and make actions accordinly.
    Author:
    yuechuan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDistanceOnInvoke() 
      boolean isCalled()
      isCalled is set to true when it was called
      boolean isContinuous() 
      UltrasonicListener setCalled(boolean called)
      set the called states
      UltrasonicListener setContinuous(boolean continuous)
      set if the listener can be reexecuted
      UltrasonicListener setDistanceOnInvoke(int distance)
      set the threshold distance
      void ultrasonicDistance(int distanceFromObstacle)
      this is the method that ultrasonic poller will execute in a Thread when the threshold distance is reached.
